price: ហើយនាវាធំៗដែលធ្វើដំណើរនៅលើផ្ទៃសមុទ្រហាក់ ដូចជាភ្នំនោះ គឺជាកម្មសិទ្ធិរបស់ទ្រង់។
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
